item.description:
Scott Pattenaude and Don Boulanger of RR Donnelley/Andrews CT will be making a comprehensive presentation on Green Printing. Green Printing is one of our industry's hottest trends and will becoming increasingly important to companies of all sizes. These Green Printing experts will fill you in on all the details. PPT presentation followed by Q&A.

RESERVING YOUR PLACE IS A TWO-STEP PROCESS!
First, RSVP via the link embedded in this email so we can track attendance.

Second, 
- Go to: www.paypal.com and select the "Send Money" tab
- Insert "[address removed]" in "Recipient's Email".
- Type in the amount you wish to send. ($24 per person)
- Select "Service" for "Type" (of money sent).
- Put ICC meeting-Nov 18 in the "Subject" box.
- Note: Use the  PayPal message box to type in your meal preference. This time our meal choices are: Talapia Caprese, Chicken Marsala, Pasta Primavera (vegetarian).

OUR RESERVATION DEADLINE is Thursday, Nov 13th. You must be paid in accordance with the instructions above before your reservation is considered accepted. Because we have to plan ahead, we need to collect money in advance. If you need to cancel, we will be able to refund your money only if you PHONE Laura Kolk at 860.646.0542 by the end of the day on Nov 13th, so that we can cancel your reservation.

We're looking forward to seeing you there!
Â« previous

group.name: Independent Creative Club of Greater Hartford

item.name: "Green Printing" Presentation by RR Donnelley
